sentences.cn: 贝尼托·加罗佐赢得让人心悦诚服。

sentences.en: He argued forcefully and convincingly that they were likely to bankrupt the budget.
sentences.cn: 他坚持认为他们可能会突破预算，而且理由非常有说服力。

sentences.en: He reasoned very wittily but not convincingly.
sentences.cn: 他的推论十分机智但不能令人信服.

sentences.en: He spoke so convincingly that even his opponents were impressed by his words.
sentences.cn: 他说的如此让人信服以至于他的反对者都对他的话语产生了深刻印象.

sentences.en: He spoke so convincingly that you couldn't help believing him.
sentences.cn: 他说得有根有梢的,不由得你不信.

sentences.en: She replies to my point so convincingly that my argument is soon in tatter.
sentences.cn: 她反驳我提出的各点都很有说服力,很快就将我的论点驳倒.

sentences.en: The fashion business, he claims, not altogether convincingly, is more real than the film business.
sentences.cn: 他声称时尚业比电影业更真实，但他的话并不完全令人信服。

sentences.en: They put the case for more financial resources very convincingly.
sentences.cn: 他们为筹集更多的资金而提出的论点非常有说服力.

sentences.en: They show convincingly that the massive accumulation of capital in Singapore encountered diminishing returns.
sentences.cn: 这些结果,令人信服,说明了:新加坡的巨额资本积累,遇到了收益递减了.

使相信；使明白（convince的现在分词）
令人信服地；有说服力地
